name: Do The Banana Splits
description: One banana, three scoops, no compromises.

name: The Classic
description: It doesn't get simpler than this.

name: Fluffernutter
description: Peanut butter ice cream with marshmallow fluff on top. Don't tell your dentist.

name: Honey Lavender
description: (Ed. note: if you find yourself in Cambridge, MA, the Honeycomb Creamery actually has this and it's *amazing*)

name: Kid Sized
description: Topped with fruit so those kids can get some vitamins for once.

name: We Went Nuts
description: We put so many nuts on this there's hardly room for ice cream.

name: Salted Caramel Dream
description: The best use of sea salt ever invented.

name: Triple Chocolate
description: We're working on Quadruple Chocolate but it's stuck in QA.

name: Cookie Monster
description: A swirl of cookies and cream with chocolate chips.

name: Strawberry Bliss
description: Fresh strawberries blended with creamy vanilla ice cream.

name: Pistachio Delight
description: A nutty delight with a smooth, creamy texture.

name: Mango Magic
description: Tropical mango flavor that makes you feel like you're on vacation.

name: Dark Chocolate Fudge
description: Rich dark chocolate with decadent fudge swirls.
